name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, Sakana, Thorfinn, NotGodot, atticusonline, bob_lamonta, makkuwata, Jeet, nutmeg, dropkickpikachu, motts, Pigs)

name: kazad
text: Blinking since 2001...

name: rainwolfj
text: That things battery is like hella good...

name: notcool
text: Yes...but is your PULSE light still blinking?

name: greenkoolayd
text: your icon scares the shit out of me.

name: notcool
text:
You should've been here for the close-up on the face of the Spiny Leaf Insect. Or the mini crash-test dummies gettin' head chopped off by a 3.5 floppy. Or Molly's Pa with his "I didn't magick up a sexy sheep" look.

Basically, I'm an avicon whore.

name: broahsaurus
text:
I would never have noticed this if not for this comment.
Now this comic gets a 5.

name: malesherbez
text: oh ray mother's day isn't in June

name: choosebro
text: He really did not want to forget.

name: lexsenthur
text: ...shit.

name: deusoma
text: Oh my God I never picked up on that before for some reason, this strip just keeps getting funnier .

name: notself
text: The blinking cursor do make it.

name: lastlarf
text: Oh man I can't believe I never spotted that!

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, tttt, pitseleh, Jewpacabra, cailetshadow)

name: ford
text: This made me laugh.  Two posts above this one asherdan made essentially the same damn comment, and not only got his requisite way-too-many lames, but was apparently completely ignored by at least two people, who then commented on the same words two positions down.  The hell?

name: gouldgonewild
text: People are such douchebags sometimes

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
People are douchebags
When you're a dildo
Faces look ugly
When you're a bone.


When you're a bone-
Faces come out of the rain?

name: carlyle
text:
Somethin' is comin' out of the rain all right .

???

name: goatmasterflash
text: I somehow doubt the people who repeated the observation were among the people who lamed the comment. Some people block his comments or have lame thresholds set too low to see them. This is the high-road method of dealing with him, and is recommended over laming him straight away, yet people are then scolded for not seeing his comment? Can't have it both ways.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: it looks like the last time ray drove this car, he was listening to KALX 90.7 FM Berkeley .

name: ntopp
text: Dang, man. Good eye.

name: tim_simmons
text: effin awesome

name: terebikun
text: Whoa, 90.7 FM is the college radio station I DJ for.  God I love Achewood.

name: belgand
text: Hmm... can he even get reception from them over there? I mean, I don't think I can even pick it up in the city (ignoring that I'm lucky to even get KUSF half the time) let alone down on the peninsula. Maybe he was over in the East Bay for some reason, but I can't imagine why. I can't imagine why anyone would ever have reason to go over there.

name: tekende
text: Classic belgand!

name: deancain29
text: I love that in reality that is what Kitt would be good for - a personal organiser.

name: biddlebubbly
text:
Personally I like the fact that it's an unmodified original Macintosh just kind of shoved into the dash.

And Ray described it as a "lotta work getting a computer installed".

name: _cheesekayke
text: By animating some part of a strip, I feel like Onstad has broken some sort of dimensional boundary. It sort of explodes the world.

name: aperson
text: Basically, this is an achewood TV episode.

name: pseudochron
text: biscuit = $100 ?

name: woodenteeth
text: Insurance and tags? Trans Am? Biscuit = $1000 surely.

name: johnnylandmine
text: I love Achewood's art because it reminds me of the charming black-and-white graphics of a Macintosh 128k. And here one is. Amazing.

name: puguglypress
text: If that's why you like Achewood's art, I'm sorry for that Todd McFarlane crack. That's SUCH a good reason.

name: dasilodavi
text: I feel the same way about my Netflix account, all sitting around all burning up cash.

name: mindbnder
text: all mothers have desires for framed pix of their son, it is fact.

name: heccibiggs
text: If I gave my mum a picture of me as a present, she'd be like, "What the hell. I don't need this. I already look at you every day in real life, why would I want a picture as well?"

name: i_love_kate
text: On the other hand, she'll be totally high and dry when you move out.

name: mindbnder
text: oddly, the use of the term 'mum' made your post approximately 37x more awesome.  As an american, if I tried to use the familiar 'mum' with my mother, i would just look silly, whereas with you it is adorable.

name: heccibiggs
text: Hehe. Fly.

name: atticusonline
text: Also, notice how heccibiggs is one of the few people on these boards who ever has anything intelligent and interesting to say.

name: tekende
text: HUGE slam on a lot of other posters out of nowhere

name: atticusonline
text: Have you seen the assetbar comments nowadays? They're completely ridiculous. I love reading the older strips where I can see quality comments about the strip from spinynorman or ford!

name: heccibiggs
text:
Ahh wow, thanks!

(Shit, this mindlessly gushing post completely contradicts the compliment you gave me.)

name: atticusonline
text: Hurry! Retract and say Fuck You Friday or something!

name: cailetshadow
text:
This is where Kitt dropped off his retarded half-brother and said that he would be "right back", he just had to "get some stuff from the corner store".

Is SO sad.

name: zem
text: I love "Yeah but I mean you I mean look"

name: cjfoster
text: so if you order the print, is it cursor on or cursor off ?

name: tekende
text: It's a Mexican Magical Realist Print. It blinks just like online.

name: fineoakstructure
text: On.

name: hereward
text: Beef uses the english term Biscuits?

name: aperson
text: Biscuits is not a term I've ever heard used in England to refer to (I'm guessing) a hundo.

name: kkrusty
text: forgive me if this has been said but have you guys noticed the thinkgeek link?  it is quite awesome.

name: ouroboros
text: why is Beef's hand on ray's shoulder on panel 9?

name: carlyle
text: That's Ray waving for Beef to follow him in the way only a rich thing could do.
